clinical_study.brief_title: Study of Tigecycline Pharmacokinetics in Patients Undergoing Continuous Renal Replacement Therapy(CRRT)
clinical_study.official_title: Pharmacokinetics of Tigecycline in Critical Ill Patients Undergoing Continuous Renal Replacement Therapy

brief_summary.textblock:
The aim of this study is to determine the Pharmacokinetics/Pharmacodynamics(PK/PD) of tigecycline in critical ill patients undergoing continuous renal replacement therapy（CRRT）and examine whether the dosage needs adjustment.
The study will observe two groups of patients respectively and compare the difference between them. Patients who need to receive CRRT when treat with high-dose tigecycline will be collected in Group CRRT. Patients who treat with high-dose tigecycline only will be collected in Group non-CRRT.

primary_outcome.description: Steady State Plasma Concentration(Css) in blood

secondary_outcome.measure: Peak Plasma Concentration(Cmax) of Tigecycline in blood
Trough Plasma Concentration(Cmin) of Tigecycline in blood
Area Under the Plasma Concentration versus Time Curve(AUC)

arm_group.description: Patients who need to treat with tigecycline for bacterial infection, have renal insufficiency and have to treat with CRRT
Patients who need to treat with tigecycline for bacterial infection, have normal renal function in ICU and have no need to treat with CRRT

intervention.description: Patients who have the definitive diagnosis to treat with tigecycline for bacterial infection will be started on tigecycline with a loading dose 200mg IV followed by 100mg IV every 12h.

biospec_descr.textblock: Whole blood, serum, urine, effluent fluid from dialysis machine

study_pop.textblock: Hospitalized Intensive Care Unit(ICU) patients in Zhujiang Hospital, in need of treatment with antiinfectives
